title: ðŸš¨ Cam Newton to join the Patriots on 1-year deal - Emergency Podcast (Football 6/28)
description:
Cam Newton will be a New England Patriot, ending months of speculation of where the former MVP would land. Now, Newton is linked up with Bill Belichick, but is he guaranteed to be the Pats starter? Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough offer their immediate reactions to the somewhat surprising signing. Health has been a concern in the past, so how will that play a factor with his role on the team? The Pick Six Superfriends break down everything from Cam's health to New England's chances to win the division to fantasy values. Join the crew for one of their patented emergency podcasts!
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â
